segments.text: It's heartbreaking seeing the water spill endlessly from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so lost in her task, unaware of the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress will be soaked soon from that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are playing around with the cookie jar up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks so unsteady; I worry for the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it could hurt badly in this wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits patiently, but this mischief might end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in light, but can't brighten this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All those dishes stacked, probably to be ruined too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden's tidy beauty makes the inside feel even more chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for everyone involved in this impending mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't moments like this stay innocent and safe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar full, yet it might cause sorrow soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene tugs at my heartstrings sadly.
segments.speaker: PAR
